itunes:title: #46: You Can't "Practice" With Unhealthy People
title: #46: You Can't "Practice" With Unhealthy People
itunes:author: Shena Lashey
itunes:subtitle: Someone people hang onto people that they shouldn't so they can "practice" their communication and boundary skills on them. In this episode, we're talking about why you shouldn't do that.    MENTIONED IN THIS EPISODE [Free Event] Saturday...
